itinerary.note_after_subtitle: If traveling by train you'll want to visit Oxford before Stratford-upon-Avon, as both are well-connected to London by train. If you're planning a road trip with all the trip extensions, you'll want to visit Bath, followed by the Cotswolds, Stratford-upon-Avon, and then Oxford.

itinerary.note_after_title: Fly or Train to Amsterdam, Netherlands

itinerary.note_after_subtitle: If you plan on visiting Ibiza but not Madrid, you might consider flying from Paris to Ibiza and then to Barcelona. If visiting Carcassonne but not Madrid, you might fly directly from Bordeaux (about 1 hour by train from Carcassonne) to Ibiza. However if you choose to visit both Barcelona and Madrid, you should fly to Ibiza in between the two.

itinerary.note_after_subtitle: Take the ferry from Port Angeles, Washington (near Olympic National Park) to Swartz Bay near Victoria, British Columbia (on Vancouver Island). After enjoying Victoria, take the ferry from nearby Swartz Bay to Tsawwassen, located just outside Vancouver, B.C.
itinerary.note_after_text: If skipping Victoria, continue on to Seattle and then to Vancouver, followed by Mt. Baker and then Mt. Rainier.

itinerary.note_after_subtitle: From Bellingham you can drive over the Canadian border to the Vancouver suburb of Tsawwassen to catch the car ferry to Swartz Bay on Vancouver Island and continue driving to nearby Victoria.
itinerary.note_after_text: From Seattle you can take the ferry from the Washington city of Port Angeles. When returning from Victoria you'll want to take the ferry back to Port Angeles, Washington as it is located adjacent to Olympic National Park.
